TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowMarkupSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 在设计时为工作流提供可扩展应用程序标记语言 (XAML) 序列化服务。

span.span: Provides the extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization services to workflows at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 提供将工作流和 类序列化为 XAML 格式以及将 XAML 内容反序列化为工作流和活动类对象的方法。 provides methods that serialize workflow and classes into XAML format and deserialize XAML content into workflow and activity class objects. 这些服务主要由工作流设计器使用，用于在工作流设计图面上保留类。These services are primarily used by workflow designers to persist the classes on the workflow design surface. 是 命名空间中包括的所有标记序列化程序的基类。 is the base class for all markup serializers included in the namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d1111c0-9447-4231-a997-96a2b74b3453)。For more information, see [Serialization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d1111c0-9447-4231-a997-96a2b74b3453). 不支持对嵌套类型进行序列化。 does not support serialization of nested types. 的功能依赖于 Windows Workflow Foundation 外部的其他类型的功能。The functionality of is dependent on functionality of other types outside of Windows Workflow Foundation. 由于这些其他类型的限制，并非所有数据类型均可以通过 序列化。Based on the limitations of those other types, not all data types can be serialized through the . 下面的列表就是部分不支持的类型的示例。The following is a list is an example of some unsupported types. > [!NOTE] > 这不是全部和完整的不支持类型的列表。This is not an exhaustive and complete list of unsupported types. 数组（只在未使用 `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` 属性 (Attribute) 值修饰属性 (Property) 时支持）Arrays (supported only if property is not decorated with `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` attribute value) 没有无参数构造函数的类型Types without parameterless constructors 多维数组Multidimensional Arrays 泛型类型（只在使用 `List` 属性 (Attribute) 值修饰属性 (Property) 时支持 `Dictionary` 和 `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` 泛型类型）Generic types (Generic `List` and `Dictionary` types supported only if property is decorated with `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` attribute value) `Hashtable` `Queue` `Stack` `XmlDocument` `MailMessage` `Bitmap` 枚举数组Enumeration Arrays 使用 FlagsAttribute 修饰的枚举Enumerations decorated with the FlagsAttribute 除此列表之外，任何同时使用 `ContentPropertyAttibute` 和 `DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute` 修饰的属性不能由 `WorkflowMarkupSerializer` 序列化。In addition to this list, any property decorated with both the `ContentPropertyAttibute` and the `DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute` cannot be serialized by `WorkflowMarkupSerializer`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行 方法之后立即调用。 is called immediately after the method runs. 可以在继承 的类中重写 ，以便在将 `obj` 序列化为可扩展应用程序标记语言 (XAML) 后在该对象上执行任何所需的处理。You can override in a class that inherits to perform any required processing on `obj` after it has been serialized to extensible Application Markup Language (XAML). 不提供任何默认行为。 provides no default behavior. 若要添加任何处理逻辑，必须在派生类中重写此方法。You must override it in a derived class to add any processing logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在即将运行 方法之前调用。 is called immediately before the method runs. 可以在继承 的类中重写 ，以便在序列化过程中的 `obj` 步骤开始之前，在 上执行所需的处理。You can override in a class that inherits to perform required processing on `obj` before it the step in the serialization process has begun. 不提供任何默认行为。 provides no default behavior. 若要添加任何处理逻辑，必须在派生类中重写此方法。You must override it in a derived class to add any processing logic.

summary.span: 将 序列化为可扩展应用程序标记语言 (XAML) 格式。

span.span: Serializes an into extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的功能依赖于 Windows Workflow Foundation 外部的其他类型的功能。The functionality of is dependent on functionality of other types outside of Windows Workflow Foundation. 由于这些其他类型的限制，并非所有数据类型均可以通过 序列化。Based on the limitations of those other types, not all data types can be serialized through the . 下面是部分不支持的类型的列表。The following is a list of some unsupported types. > [!NOTE] > 这不是全部和完整的不支持类型的列表。This is not an exhaustive and complete list of unsupported types. 数组（只在使用 `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` 属性 (Attribute) 值修饰属性 (Property) 时支持）Arrays (supported only if property is decorated with `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` attribute value) 无参数构造函数Parameterless Constructors 多维数组Multidimensional Arrays 泛型类型（只在使用 `List` 属性 (Attribute) 值修饰属性 (Property) 时支持 `Dictionary` 和 `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` 泛型类型）Generic types (Generic `List` and `Dictionary` types supported only if property is decorated with `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` attribute value) `Hashtable` `Queue` `Stack` `XmlDocument` `MailMessage` `Bitmap` 枚举数组Enumeration Arrays 除此列表之外，任何同时使用 `ContentPropertyAttibute` 和 `DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute` 修饰的属性不能由 `WorkflowMarkupSerializer` 序列化。In addition to this list, any property decorated with both the `ContentPropertyAttibute` and the `DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute` cannot be serialized by `WorkflowMarkupSerializer`.

public: void Serialize(System::Xml::XmlWriter ^ writer, System::Object ^ obj);

param.name: writer
param.span: 一个 ，其中包含在序列化时使用的流或文件。

span.span: An that contains the stream or file used in serializing.
The object to be serialized.

summary.span: 将指定的 序列化到工作流标记文件或流中。

span.span: Serializes the specified into a workflow markup file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须在以编程方式创建的工作流中序列化工作流类型的新实例或者序列化根活动，以便创建可在 中用于创建 的工作流标记。You must serialize either a new instance of a workflow type or the root activity in a programmatically-created workflow to create workflow markup that can be used in to create a . 有关工作流标记的详细信息，请参阅[使用工作流标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4)。For more information about workflow markup, see [Using Workflow Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).

span.span: is a null reference ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须在以编程方式创建的工作流中序列化工作流类型的新实例或者序列化根活动，以便创建可在 中用于创建 的工作流标记。You must serialize either a new instance of a workflow type or the root activity in a programmatically-created workflow to create workflow markup that can be used in to create a . 工作流标记的详细信息，请参阅[使用工作流标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4)。For more information on workflow markup, see [Using Workflow Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).

span.span: The that manages the serialization process.
The to serialize to a string.

summary.span: 将指定的 序列化为字符串。

span.span: Serializes the specified to a string.

returns.span: 包含已序列化的 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the serialized .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果可以从 为 `value` 实例赋值，则 会将与 `value` 关联的方法名写入到字符串中。If a instance is assignable from `value`, writes the method name associated with `value` to a string. 如果可以从 为 `value` 实例赋值，则 会将与 `value` 关联的类型的完全限定名写入到字符串中。If a instance is assignable from `value`, writes the fully-qualified name of the type associated with `value` to a string. 如果上述条件均不存在，则 会将 `value` 转换为字符串并写入结果。If neither of these conditions exist, converts `value` to a string and writes the result.

exception.span: 或 包含空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: or contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示 是否应序列化指定的 。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the should serialize the specified .

returns.span: 为 则指示应序列化 ；否则为 。

span.span: to indicate should be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 在序列化指定对象之前调用。 is called by before it serializes the specified object. 如果 `false` 包含空引用 (`value`)，或者如果 `Nothing` 与当前序列化上下文的 `value` 相等，则该方法返回 。The method returns `false` if `value` contains a null reference (`Nothing`) or if `value` and the of the current serialization context are equal. 在从 继承的类中，可以重写 ，以便自定义如何确定是否应序列化指定的对象。You can override in a class that inherits from to customize how to determine whether the specified object should be serialized.

Public Shared ReadOnly XClassProperty As DependencyProperty
public: static initonly System::Workflow::ComponentModel::DependencyProperty ^ XClassProperty;

summary.span: 表示一个附加的 ，它定义将在编译期间创建的类型名。

span.span: Represents an attached that defines the type name, which will be created during compilation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值对应于 XAML 中的 `x:Class` 属性。This value corresponds to `x:Class` attribute in XAML. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用工作流标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4)。For more information, see [Using Workflow Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4). 此属性仅在设计时使用。This property is used only at design time. 编译完成后，它成为已编译类型的名称。After compilation, it becomes the name of the compiled type. [!INCLUDE[DependencyPropertyRemark](~/includes/dependencypropertyremark-md.md)]
